text:
@MPSHackney @PrisonPlanet People are not stupid

In the age the age of the internet, info is everywhere

People know the risk of them dying from Covid-19 is extremely low (unless they're classed as clinically vulnerable) & as such are simply getting on with life

We won't be put under house arrest anymore
